strapiPost.title: Arkansas Volleyball Hosts Historic Midweek Matchup
strapiPost.content:
Hosting a #1 ranked team at home for the first time in 13 years, the #21 Arkansas Razorbacks take on the #1 Wisconsin Badgers this week at Barnhill Arena on Wednesday and Thursday at 7p.

Our House: Arkansas and Wisconsin have never faced one another at a non-neutral location. With the homecourt advantage, Arkansas looks to defeat a top-10 team inside Barnhill for the 3rd time in 2 seasons — following its two top-10 home wins last season.

Red and White: The Razorbacks are 2-0 to start 2023 with sweeps over Michigan State and Tulsa. Help the team secure their next win by packing out Barnhill! Wednesday's match will be a RED OUT, and Thursday's match will be a WHITE OUT.

Tickets are $5 for kids and $10 for adults. Bring the whole family, and let’s CALL THOSE HOGS. Get your tickets HERE!
